glsa.title: xine-lib: Two heap overflow vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Two vulnerabilities have been found in xine-lib which could lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: xine-lib is a multimedia library which can be utilized to create multimedia frontends.

description.p: Heap overflows have been found in the code handling RealMedia RTSP and Microsoft Media Services streams over TCP (MMST).

impact.p: By setting up a malicious server and enticing a user to use its streaming data, a remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code on the client computer with the permissions of the user running any multimedia frontend making use of the xine-lib library.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
